binge eating disorder
For many patients, binge eating
disorder is a cycle of…

Binge, shame, guilt.
Repeat.

Adults with binge eating disorder (BED) carry on in silence for years, too embarrassed and ashamed to talk about their bingeing, all the while compromising their physical and mental health. 1-8 It’s time to interrupt their suffering.

BED is the most common eating disorder
It often goes untreated for years
BED is a psychological condition
Emerging evidence of BED neurobiology
Finding BED in your patients
The DSM-5® criteria
